H0.text: where was mary todd lincoln from. Springfield

H1.text: where was mary todd lincoln from. Louisville

H2.text: where was mary todd lincoln from. Frankfort

H3.text: where was mary todd lincoln from. Lexington

A4.text: Mary Todd was born into a large and wealthy slave-owning family in Kentucky, although Mary never owned slaves and in her adulthood came to oppose slavery.

A5.text: From 1832, Mary and her family lived in what is now known as the Mary Todd Lincoln House, an elegant 14-room residence at 578 West Main Street in Lexington.
